SEARCH
Package org.example.model.transform

Class AffineTransform2D

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.transform.AffineTransform2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transform2D
public class AffineTransform2D extends Object implements Transform2D

AffineTransform2D.

A class representing an affine transformation in 2D space. It has a method for transforming a vector using the affine transformation. The class implements the Transform2D interface.

An affine transformation is represented by a 2x2 matrix and a 2D vector, where it transforms point by multiplying the point by the matrix and adding the vector.

Since:
0.1.0
Version:
1.0.0
